title: How to talk to girls 101: For the guys who treat women Like NPCs
content:
Dear male humans of PES, 
 I've seen a couple of posts about this, so this is a public service announcement for those of you who still think talking to a girl requires a PhD in psychology or divine intervention

1. Be hygienic and dress properly.
This is an obvious one, but a lot of guys seem to fail at it. Clean clothes, combed hair, and maybe a shower. Appearance matters to everyone regardless of gender.


2. Don‚Äôt approach when she‚Äôs busy.
If she‚Äôs on her phone, with friends, or looks like she‚Äôs in a rush, don‚Äôt barge in. Wait for a better moment.
If she‚Äôs talking to someone else or wearing earphones, don‚Äôt bother.


3. Talk about something relevant.
If you're in the same class, talk about class. If you‚Äôre both in the same place, mention something related to that. Keep it natural.
Some topics could be:

Upcoming exams or assignments (if you‚Äôre in the same class)

Events happening around campus

Mutual friends or acquaintances

Something interesting you both might have seen recently (like a movie or a TV show)



4. Don‚Äôt text endlessly.
If she‚Äôs not replying, stop texting. Don‚Äôt flood her chats like some desperate idiot. If she wants to talk, she‚Äôll respond.


5. Observe body language.
If she‚Äôs avoiding eye contact, leaning away, or looking uncomfortable, don‚Äôt be a dumbass and keep pushing.


6. Don‚Äôt get too close too soon.
Start with simple conversation. No ‚Äúyou‚Äôre so cute‚Äù or ‚Äúyou‚Äôre like a sister‚Äù stuff. Don‚Äôt dive into deep, weird topics right away.


7. If she‚Äôs not interested, don‚Äôt keep going.
If she‚Äôs giving you one-word answers or avoiding you, take the hint, and stop being a pest.


8. Be NORMAL.
No ‚Äúrizz‚Äù bullshit or trying to act like you‚Äôre cooler than you actually are.


9. Give genuine compliments that are not always about looks
Compliment her on her character or talents. Tell her, ‚ÄúYou sing really well,‚Äù or "I admire your creativity with that project" Avoid bullshit like ‚ÄúYou‚Äôre so hot bb.‚Äù Compliments that reflect her qualities matter a lot more.


10. Know when to wrap it up.
If the conversation‚Äôs dying, don‚Äôt drag it out. Just walk away like a normal person.


11. Don‚Äôt use cringe ass WhatsApp pickup lines.
They never work. Just talk to her like a damn human being


12. Don‚Äôt be afraid to be awkward.
Trust me a lot of girls feel awkward around guys too so don‚Äôt sweat it. Just own it and keep going.

The same applies for girls
